nodes.text: Nym's slugthrower-carbine was a weapon produced by Nym. This slugthrower featured a liquid piston shock-absorbing stock assembly, and an advanced heat dissipation system for greater firepower, allowing for longer bursts exceeding most other carbines.
Star Wars Galaxies uses the same 3D model for Nym's slugthrower and the Corestrike Rancor.
